languages.text: "Наша маленькая гостья постигает искусство, что утратила вместе со своими собратьями века и века назад". {n}Голос друкари сочится приторным злорадством.{/n} "Искусство наслаждения, не обремененное напрасными запретами. Искусство извлекать восторг и радость из чужой плоти помимо воли ее владельца. Искусство идти путем друкари — не так ли, моя заплутавшая Азуриани?"

traits.locale_text: "Наша маленькая гостья постигает искусство, что утратила вместе со своими собратьями века и века назад". {n}Голос друкари сочится приторным злорадством.{/n} "Искусство наслаждения, не обремененное напрасными запретами. Искусство извлекать восторг и радость из чужой плоти помимо воли ее владельца. Искусство идти путем друкари — не так ли, моя заплутавшая Азурьяни?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"
languages.original_text: "Наша маленькая гостья постигает искусство, что утратила вместе со своими собратьями века и века назад". {n}Голос друкари сочится приторным злорадством.{/n} "Искусство наслаждения, не обремененное напрасными запретами. Искусство извлекать восторг и радость из чужой плоти помимо воли ее владельца. Искусство идти путем друкари — не так ли, моя заплутавшая Азуриани?"

traits.locale_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}He gloats in a saccharine voice.{/n} "The art of delight that is free from meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari, isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari, isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: 「この小さな客人は、彼女とその同胞が何世紀も前に失った芸術を学んでいるんだ」{n}デュカーリは鼻につくような話しぶりでほくそ笑む。{/n}「無意味なタブーから解放された喜びの芸術。所有者の意思に反して、他人の肉体から歓喜を引き出す芸術。デュカーリの道を歩む術、そうだろう、俺の迷えるアシュリヤーニ？」
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: 「この小さな客人は、彼女とその同胞が何世紀も前に失った芸術を学んでいるんだ」{n}デュカーリは鼻につくような話しぶりでほくそ笑む。{/n}「無意味なタブーから解放された喜びの芸術。所有者の意思に反して、他人の肉体から歓喜を引き出す芸術。デュカーリの道を歩む術、そうだろう、俺の迷えるアシュリヤーニ？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: “我们的小客人正在学习她和她的亲族很久以前就已经遗忘的艺术。”{n}黑暗灵族以令人厌恶的语气，幸灾乐祸地开了口。{/n}“这是快乐的艺术，摆脱了那些毫无意义的禁令。这是从猎物的肉体中榨取喜悦的艺术，也是踏上黑暗灵族道途的艺术。是这样吧，迷失的方舟灵族？”
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: “我们的小客人正在学习她和她的亲族很久以前就已经遗忘的艺术。”{n}黑暗灵族以令人厌恶的语气，幸灾乐祸地开了口。{/n}“这是快乐的艺术，摆脱了那些毫无意义的禁令。这是从猎物的肉体中榨取喜悦的艺术，也是踏上黑暗灵族道途的艺术。是这样吧，迷失的方舟灵族？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: «Nuestra pequeña invitada está aprendiendo el arte que ella y los suyos perdieron hace eones». {n}El Drukhari alardea con un tono empalagoso.{/n} «El arte de un deleite libre de los tabúes sin sentido. El arte de extraer el éxtasis de la carne ajena en contra de la voluntad de su dueño. El arte de caminar por la senda de los Drukhari, ¿no es así, mi Asuryani perdida?».
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra pequeña invitada está aprendiendo el arte que ella y los suyos perdieron hace eones». {n}El Drukhari alardea con un tono empalagosoa.{/n} «El arte de un deleite libre de los tabúes sin sentido. El arte de extraer el éxtasis de la carne ajena en contra de la voluntad de su dueño. El arte de caminar por la senda de los Drukhari, ¿no es así, mi Asuryani perdida?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Unser kleiner Gast lernt die Kunst, die sie und ihre Verwandten vor Ewigkeiten verloren haben",{n} prahlt die Drukhari in einer klebrigen Stimme.{/n} "Die Kunst des Verzückens, unbehelligt von bedeutungslosen Tabus. Die Kunst, dem Fleisch eines anderen gegen den Willen des Eigentümers Entrückung zu entreißen. Die Kunst, den Pfad der Drukhari zu beschreiten. Nicht wahr, meine kleinen Asuryani?"
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: "Unser kleiner Gast lernt die Kunst, die sie und ihre Verwandten vor Ewigkeiten verloren haben",{n} prahlt die Drukhari in einer klebrigen Stimme.{/n} "Die Kunst des Verzückens, die frei von bedeutungslosen Tabus ist. Die Kunst, dem Fleisch eines anderen gegen den Willen des Eigentümers Entrückung zu entreißen. Die Kunst, den Pfad der Drukhari zu beschreiten, nicht wahr, meine verlorene Asuryani?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: « Notre petite invitée doit apprendre l'art qu'elle et ses congénères ont oublié il y a des siècles, {n}répond le Drukhari avec une mièvrerie écœurante.{/n} L'art de la délectation, libre de tout tabou inutile. L'art d'extraire l'extase de la chair d'autrui contre sa volonté. L'art d'emprunter la voie des Drukharis. N'est-ce pas, ma petite Asuryani ? »
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: « Notre petite invitée doit apprendre l'art qu'elle et ses semblables ont oublié il y a des siècles, {n}répond le Drukhari avec une mièvrerie écœurante.{/n} L'art de la délectation, libre de tout tabou inutile. L'art d'extraire l'extase de la chair d'un autre contre sa volonté. L'art d'emprunter la voie des Drukharis. N'est-ce pas, ma petite Asuryani ? »
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Minik misafirimiz, çağlar önce soydaşlarıyla birlikte unuttuğu bir sanatı öğreniyor." {n}Ses tonu yılışık çıkan Drukhari, keyifle konuşuyor.{/n} "Anlamsız tabulardan uzak bir haz sanatı bu. Rızası hilafına bir başkasının bedenini kullanarak kendinden geçme sanatı. Drukharilerin yolundan gitme sanatı. Öyle değil mi kaybolmuş Asuryanim?"
languages.original_text: "Our little guest is learning the art she and her kin lost aeons ago," {n}the Drukhari gloats in a cloying tone of voice.{/n} "The art of delight, unhampered by meaningless taboos. The art of extracting rapture from another's flesh against the will of its owner. The art of walking the path of the Drukhari. Isn't that right, my lost Asuryani?"

traits.locale_text: "Minik misafirimiz, çağlar önce soydaşlarıyla birlikte unuttuğu bir sanatı öğreniyor." {n}Drukhari, yılışık bir ses tonuyla keyifle konuşuyor.{/n} "Anlamsız tabulardan uzak bir haz sanatı bu. Rızası hilafına bir başkasının bedenini kullanarak kendinden geçme sanatı. Drukharilerin yolundan gitme sanatı. Öyle değil mi canım kayıp Asuryani'm?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit
